entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
